vote.title: To authorize an amendment to the 2022 Capital Improvement Budget; to authorize a transfer of cash and appropriation within the Sanitary Bond Fund; to authorize the Director of Public Utilities to renew and increase a professional engineering services contract with DLZ Ohio for the Lower Olentangy Tunnel project; and to authorize an expenditure of up to $1,884,000.00 from the Sanitary Bond Fund to pay for the renewal.  ($1,884,000.00)
vote.description: A motion was made by Rob Dorans, seconded by Nicholas Bankston, that this Ordinance be Approved. The motion carried by the following vote:
